text: Answer: 33.33 Solution: Number of cycles to transfer 60 bits from disk to buffer 60 bits =——— secC 200 x 10”6 = 300 nanoseconds (3 cycles) Therefore, the CPU will be blocked for 1 cycle from 3 cycles .. percentage of the time the CPU gets blocked =2¥100 = 33.33% Note: The disk transfer and buffer to memory transfer will overlap each other, except for the first 60 bits of transfer.
